attributes.action: Change conveyancing in this country to one that provides surety to all parties.
attributes.additional_details:
My family have recently been stung by the lack of surety when house buying and everyone I speak to agrees things need to change.

Everyone knows how stressful house moves are and it’s one element we can easily address.
attributes.background: Adopt a conveyancing system similar to the Scottish one. The mental health issues caused by our system is totally avoidable. All searches and surveys should be in place before a property is marketed and vendors be held accountable. Gazumping should be illegal.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323521
